data.text: @DevineTime222 Well when he meant it differently... I will check. When I heard that I just thought he cannot be serious. But well, you are right, how media shares news is the other thing. That’s why I want to talk about it. Everything has two sides. Thanks for replying.
@SannySpear He went back and said he worded it wrong. If you actually saw what he meant it wasn’t to bring back slavery but we both know how the news media works.
